hero.status: Looking for Apprenticeship • Master 2 AI • Sept. 2026
hero.name: Romaric
hero.description: Passionate about Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I transform data into intelligent solutions, from preprocessing to production deployment.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Passionate about Data Science and Artificial Intelligence, I am currently pursuing a Master's in AI at EPSI Paris. My journey has allowed me to develop strong expertise in Machine Learning and MLOps.
about.paragraph2: I master data pipelines, advanced preprocessing, statistical testing, and model deployment in production. My stack includes Python, advanced SQL, Scikit-learn, XGBoost, and cloud services.
about.paragraph3: I am looking for an apprenticeship for my Master 2 starting September 2026, where I can apply my skills and contribute to innovative data projects.
about.objectiveText: Become a Data Science expert capable of designing, developing, and deploying end-to-end ML solutions that create business value.

projects.title: My Projects

list.title: ChurnGuard

list.title: TalentMatch
list.description: Intelligent candidate-job matching system using NLP and Machine Learning. Semantic analysis of CVs and job descriptions for precise recommendations.

list.title: PricePrediction
list.description: Real estate price prediction model with advanced regression. Intuitive interface to estimate property value based on characteristics and location.
